      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_7738d53e6eb222244088500d4e0f8e9bcc792e94</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sending electrical signals through optical fibres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Senden der elektrischen Signale durch optische 
Fasern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Envoi des signaux électriques par les fibres 
optiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Emitindo sinais elétricos através das fibras 
óticas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">_ trasmett elettrico segnale attraverso ottico 
fibra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αποστολή των ηλεκτρικών σημάτων μέσω των οπτικών 
ινών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Enviar señales eléctricas a través de fibras 
ópticas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration differentiates an optical fibre cable (bottom) from a copper wire cable (top) in sending electrical signals from telephone calls.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">telephone calls</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper wires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrical signals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">infra-red rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">optical fibres</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung unterscheidet ein 
Lichtwellenleiterkabel (Unterseite) von einem kupfernen Drahtseil 
(Oberseite) wenn sie elektrische Signale von den Telefonanrufen 
sendet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration différencie un câble à 
fibres optiques (bas) d'un câble de fil de cuivre (dessus) en 
envoyant les signaux électriques des appels téléphoniques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração diferencia um cabo de fibra 
ótica (fundo) de um cabo de fio de cobre (alto) em emitir sinais 
elétricos dos atendimentos de telefone.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione differenzia un cavo di fibra
ottica (parte inferiore) da un cavo di legare di rame (parte 
superiore) nella trasmissione dei segnali elettrici dalle telefonate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση διαφοροποιεί ένα καλώδιο οπτικών 
ινών (κατώτατο σημείο) από ένα καλώδιο καλωδίων χαλκού 
(κορυφή) στην αποστολή των ηλεκτρικών σημάτων από τα 
τηλεφωνήματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración distingue un cable de fibra 
óptica (fondo) de un cable de alambre de cobre (tapa) en enviar 
señales eléctricas de llamadas telefónicas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Telefonanrufe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kupferne Leitungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Signale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Infrarotstrahlen</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
